text: @NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP I can’t even believe your tweet. @realDonaldTrump is literally a murder!  He has not provided all the items States need & then blames them! If you support him you’re just as bad #coronavirus #Covid_19 #Cuomo #CuomoForPresident

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
